name: Do-R-over
description:
Controls
WASD - Move rover
E - Deploy energy pylon
Esc - Open discoveries menu

Do-R-Over is a game about exploring an uncharted planet. Your rover has limited power and can initially only recharge by placing energy pylons. Along your way.

If you run out of power, the expedition ends and you can start a new expedition by buying a new rover using your research funds. Discovering new things on the planet will add to your research funds.

Known Bugs

  • The scrollbar in the discoveries menu does not work.
